spousebuttonYes.initial: Select if you have a spouse or common-law partner.

connectedPersonbuttonYes.initial: Select if you are a connected person.

rppplanSelectionPO.birthDate: Enter a valid date of birth. Check that the month, day and year are correct.

connectedPersonDetailedText.item: You're a connected person if you're not independent of your employer. For example, if you're a relative of the companyâ€™s owners, including by marriage or adoption. You're also a connected person if you're a specified shareholder as defined in Canada's Income Tax Act; or if you directly or indirectly own 10% or more of your employer's stock, or stock of a company related to your employer.

connectedPersonDisclaimer.item: If you're a connected person, your employer must submit Form T1007 to the Canada Revenue Agency within 60 days of you joining the RPP.

planAdditionalInfoQuestions.item: Do you have a spouse or common-law partner?

planHeader.item: Since you've selected an RPP, we need some additional information from you.

plansubHeader.item: You'll need to answer all of the questions before continuing. Depending on your answers, more questions may appear.
